title: The Libraries, Museums and Art Galleries Year Book
additional-note: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. Title pages of some volumes note Bowker in New York as a co-publisher or distributor, though we are not sure whether the publication was simultaneous.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Shelton Henderson for copyright research on this title.
